ygData.subject: Re: Where can I buy pottery sketches as a Dark Elf?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard reports of a Dark Elf merchant in S Ro, with sketches. ... eq_neriak@onelist.com, eq-necromancers@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard reports of a Dark Elf merchant in S Ro, with sketches.

On Fri, 2 Jul 1999, Kelly Pruett wrote:

> Date: Fri, 02 Jul 1999 11:09:41 -0400
> From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
> Reply-To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
> To: eq-errolisi_marr@onelist.com, eq_potters@onelist.com,
eq_neriak@onelist.com, eq-necromancers@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Potters] Where can I buy pottery sketches as a Dark Elf?
>
> From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
>
> Are there any evil potters out there that can tell
> me where to find pottery sketches? I have access
> to all other items in Neriak but unless I missed
> it, none of the evil cities have the sketches.
>
> Thanks in advance,
> -Haytred
